CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 25, 1964, pg. 6 reads: "Airman And Mrs. Rudolph T. Lewis, Jr. ...happy newlyweds."  Portion of accompanying article reads: "During a recent ceremony at St. Brigid (formerly Old Holy Trinity Church), his Excellency, Most Rev. John J. Wright, Bishop of the Catholic Diocese of Pittsburgh, united in matrimony, Theresa Louise Thigpen and Airman Second Class Rudolph Thomas Lewis Jr.  The ceremony was followed by a solemn high mass with Msgr. Paul Bassompierre as the celebrant and the Revs. William Hogan and Thomas Reilly, the deacon and sub-deacon.  The bride is the daughter of Mrs. Billie Thigpen of Pittsburgh.  The groom is the son of Mr. and Mrs. Stanley Carroll, also of Pittsburgh."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Theresa Louise Thigpen Lewis, posed in Loendi Club during wedding breakfast
